full_title: WHATCHU KNO ABOUT ME by GloRilla & Sexyy Red
title: WHATCHU KNO ABOUT ME

description.plain:
“WATCHU KNO ABOUT ME” marks the first collaboration between American female rappers, GloRilla & Sexyy Red. GloRilla first teased this song on an Instagram live on September 14, 2024. The song samples “Wipe Me Down” by Boosie & Webbie, It was officially released on October 11th, 2024, as the 3rd single off of GloRilla’s debut studio album.

In the track, both Glo & Sexyy showcases their fierce and unapologetic attitudes over an up-beat twerk-anthem beat. The song emphasizes confidence, independence, and self-empowerment, with both MC’s delivering verses that celebrate their success.

embed_content: Read “WHATCHU KNO ABOUT ME” by GloRilla & Sexyy Red on Genius
